Class Cluster

extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    JDK 1.5

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BindingTable bindingTable
      the binding table for the proper LHS-only variables of the cluster from the current iteration
      protected java.util.Set<int[]> delta
      insted of reduplicating the nameToPos mapping from bindingTable, we only store the table for new information
      protected java.util.Set<int[]> old
      insted of reduplicating the nameToPos mapping from bindingTable, we only store the table for information from the old iteration
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> positions
      a list of position indices telling the system which LHS clauses will go together for this cluster
      protected java.util.Set<int[]> table
      instead of reduplicating the nameToPos mapping from bindingTable, we only store the table for information from the last iteration
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Predicate> tests
      applicable predicates (wo/ in-eqs, of course)
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> varconstIneqs
      applicable var-const ineqs
      protected java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> variables
      a set of proper variables that are involved in this cluster
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> varvarIneqs
      applicable var-var ineqs
